gui.armorplus.config.title: ArmorPlus 配置
armorplus.lava_crystal.tooltip: 熔岩水晶世界矿物生成配置
jei.item.armorplus.guardian_scale.desc: Used to craft the Guardian weapons, armor and the Ultimate Material.
jei.item.armorplus.wither_bone.desc: Used to craft the Super Star weapons, armor and the Ultimate Material.
jei.item.armorplus.ender_dragon_scale.de: Used to craft the Ender Dragon weapons, armor and the Ultimate Material.
jei.item.armorplus.lava_infuser.desc: Used to create Infusing Lava Crystals and infuse Obsidian blocks into Lava Infused Obsidian. Lava Buckets and/or Lava Crystals are required.
modifier.firestorm.desc: §oThe real Super Nova!§r\nBonus fire damage, sets your enemies on fire.
gui.armorplus.info.text_line_three: 若你想切换至简单模式，请
commands.armorplus.error.arg.player.miss: 你必须指定某个玩家作为该操作的目标。
commands.armorplus.error.unknown: 找不到此命令！请使用 /armorplus help 获得帮助信息。
commands.armorplus.error.perm: 你没有权限使用此命令。
commands.armorplus.help.help: 显示 "/armorplus" 指令的帮助信息。
commands.armorplus.info.help: 显示 ArmorPlus 的相关信息。
commands.armorplus.wiki.help: 在你的浏览器中打开 ArmorPlus Wiki 页面。
Opens a link in your browser to my Patreon page
commands.armorplus.wiki.link_open: Opens a link to SoFoDev's (ArmorPlus) Developer Patreon page
commands.armorplus.nodecraft.help: Displays the promo code(s) for Nodecraft.
commands.armorplus.nodecraft.about.text: This project is sponsored by Nodecraft.
commands.armorplus.nodecraft.promo.end.t: for %s off your first month of service!
commands.armorplus.discord.help: 在你的浏览器中打开 sokratis12GR's official discord 服务器的邀请链接。
commands.armorplus.discord.hover: Opens a discord link to the ArmorPlus discord server
commands.armorplus.abilities.clear.succe: You have successfully removed all abilities from this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.clear.fail: This item doesn't contain any abilities.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.fail: Sorry, cannot add more abilities to this item. Your limit [%d/%d].
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.fail.al: Sorry, this ability is already provided to this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.success: You have successfully added the [%s] ability to this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.hide.us: Use hide to not show the command's output.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.incorre: You cannot add [%s] to this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.usage.secon: Incomplete command arguments. Use /armorplus abilities add <string: abilityID>
commands.armorplus.abilities.wrong_item: This command can only be used on ArmorPlus items.
commands.armorplus.abilities.limit: This item has a limit of [%d/%d] abilities.
commands.armorplus.abilities.limit.set.u: Incomplete command arguments. Use /armorplus abilities limit set <int: limit>
commands.armorplus.abilities.limit.set: Sucessfully set the limit of this item to %s/%s
commands.armorplus.abilities.remove.usag: Incomplete command arguments. Use /armorplus abilities remove <string: abilityID>
commands.armorplus.abilities.remove.fail: You cannot remove [%s] because it doesn't exist.
enchantment.armorplus.life_steal.desc: Steals the attacked entity's health and heals you
enchantment.armorplus.furious.desc: When hit you get furious, giving you strength and speed boost based on level.
enchantment.armorplus.unknown.desc: Provides a different effect based on the type of item its applied on
tooltip.armorplus.lava_crystal.desc: Can be obtained by mining Ore Lava Crystal
tooltip.armorplus.infused_lava_crystal.d: Can be created by infusing the Lava Crystal inside the Lava Infuser
tooltip.armorplus.dev_tool.desc_one: §cOnly works if debugMode is set to true in the configuration file [debugMode:%s]
tooltip.armorplus.lava_crystal.how_to_in: Can become infused when thrown in lava
tooltip.armorplus.frost_crystal.how_to_i: Can become infused when thrown struct by lightning
tooltip.armorplus.frost_lava_crystal.lor: The essence of nature burns within this frozen crystal
tooltip.armorplus.base_soulless: Hmm... Seems to be missing a soul!
tooltip.armorplus.soul: Acquired by killing the %s, with a Soul Stealer enchanted weapon.
tooltip.armorplus.boss_soul: Additionally, you may craft it using lesser tier souls.
tooltip.armorplus.not_accessible: This item is NOT currently available for survival
tooltip.armorplus.not_accessible.2: Only way to obtain this item is in Creative mode
tooltip.armorplus.thank_you_6m.2: I don't even know what to say..
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_one: You really think you even want to get me started with you?
This fight will be over way before it even starts.
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_thr: It seems that you are enjoying my minions...
Well, I got some news to you.
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_fou: There is no escape from me!
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_six: Nothing can stop me from destroying this world
If my minions, cannot kill you. then I'll kill you myself!
Minions, CHARGE with your full power!!!
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.death_li: The end is near, but remember I'll be BACK
And there will be an END to this world.
